named-query.name: find_ok
named-query.query: select t from Student as t where t.age = :age

named-native-query.name: student.n_find_m
named-native-query.query: select count(*) from t_student t where t.age = :age

named-native-query.name: student.n_find_mt
named-native-query.query: select count(*),sum(t.age) from t_student t where t.age > :age
